targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, $groupBy) (rate(mo_txn_statement_duration_seconds_bucket{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixorigin_io_owner=~"$owner", type="execute", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, $groupBy) (rate(mo_txn_statement_duration_seconds_bucket{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixorigin_io_owner=~"$owner", type="execute", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by(le, $groupBy) (rate(mo_txn_statement_duration_seconds_bucket{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixorigin_io_owner=~"$owner", type="execute", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum(rate(mo_txn_life_duration_seconds_sum{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixorigin_io_owner=~"$owner", pod=~"$pod"}[$interval])) by ($groupBy) / sum(rate(mo_txn_life_duration_seconds_count{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixorigin_io_owner=~"$owner", pod=~"$pod"}[$interval])) by ($groupBy)

(
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$pvc"})) by (persistentvolumeclaim))
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$pvc"})) by (persistentvolumeclaim))
)

(sum(kube_pod_status_phase{pod=~"$pod|$syspod", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", phase="Failed"}) by (pod) * 1) + (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{pod=~"$pod|$syspod", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", phase="Pending"}) by (pod) * 2) + (sum(kube_pod_status_phase{pod=~"$pod|$syspod", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", phase="Running"}) by (pod) * 3) + (sum(up{pod=~"$pod|$syspod"}) by (pod) * 10)

(
  sum((1 - sum without (mode) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", mode=~"idle|iowait|steal", node=~"$node"}[$interval])))) by (node)
/ count by (node) (node_cpu_seconds_total{job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", mode="idle", node=~"$node"})
)
